sentence.Network_en: We had a bumpy flight over the centre of Panama.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的飞机摇摇晃晃地飞过巴拿马中部地区。

sentence.Network_en: The public registry in Panama City keeps computerized records of all companies.
sentence.Network_cn: 巴拿马城的公共注册处把所有公司的登记信息都存入了电脑。

sentence.Network_en: He wore a panama hat and a crisp white suit.
sentence.Network_cn: 他戴着一顶巴拿马草帽，穿着一身挺括的白西装。

sentences.en: Panama lies to the south of the U.S.A.
North America is connected with South America by the Isthmus of Panama.
